data.title: Woodspring Suites Huntsville-Madison
data.meta_description: Value Place is delighted to offer a comfortable, clean lodging option. Efficiently priced for daily, weekly and monthly stays. The hotel is staffed 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. They offer a fully furnished suite that includes a kitchen with stove top, fridge and microwave. Housekeeping is offered bi-weekly for longer stays and is available more often or for shorter stays for a small fee. Cooking and dining utensils are available for purchase. A 24 hour coin operated laundry facility and vending service is available. Value Place Huntsville, AL (Madison) 120 Brazelton Circle, Madison,AL 35758 View Directions Intersection: I-565 & Intergraph Way (exit 8) Phone: 256-325-6300
data.text:
Value Place is delighted to offer a comfortable, clean lodging option. Efficiently priced for daily, weekly and monthly stays. The hotel is staffed 24 hours a day, 7 days a week. They offer a fully furnished suite that includes a kitchen with stove top, fridge and microwave. Housekeeping is offered bi-weekly for longer stays and is available more often or for shorter stays for a small fee. Cooking and dining utensils are available for purchase. A 24 hour coin operated laundry facility and vending service is available.

Value Place Huntsville, AL (Madison)
